Profile - About Me

atul adhikari
  • Atul Chandra Adhikari
  • February 27, 1993
  • Chicago , IL
  • atuladhikari.1993@gmail.com

I was born in Nepal and was raised in Cambodia for the first 6 years of my life before my family moved back to Nepal where I finished my middle school and high school. I came to America in 2011 to pursue my academic studies and have been here ever since.

I have an academic background in Computer Science and Business Strategy. I'm passionate about building products, gleaning scientific insights from data and developing business strategy around it.

Experience
  • Software Engineering Intern 2011 - 2013
    UI Labs

    • Created full stack features within an MVC design pattern using AngularJS, Spring / Java REST API and Postgres database. Also led usability sessions with 40+ users and created UI wireframes based on user feedback.

  • Advisory Intern 2010 - 2011
    PwC

    • Adopted clustering and outlier detection techniques to identify fraudulent transactions for a financial client’s banking platform using 20GB+ of data accumulated over several months

  • Data Analyst Intern 2010 - 2011
    Inveneo

    • Developed Inveneo’s Open Data Kit (open source software for data collection) project for Ethiopia and oversaw its technical and strategic deployment in various schools in 35 Ethiopian cities. Also analyzed education performance data based on surveys.
